construct an event model

Source: R/all_generic.R
event_model.Rd

A data sructure representing an event-based fMRI regression model

event_model(
  x,
  data,
  block,
  sampling_frame,
  drop_empty = TRUE,
  durations = 0,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

the model specification, typically a formula (see examples)

data

the data containing experimental design

block

formula for the block structure

sampling_frame

the sampling frame defining the temporal and block structure

drop_empty

whether to drop empty factor levels

durations

the event durations

...

extra args

Examples

event_data <- data.frame(fac=c("a", "B", "A", "B"), onsets=c(1,10,20,80), run=c(1,1,1,1))
sframe <- sampling_frame(blocklens=50, TR=2)
evmodel <- event_model(onsets ~ hrf(fac), data=event_data, block= ~ run, sampling_frame=sframe)
